Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='DLRPK03')

BibliographicData.Title: Cortical connections of the second somatosensory area and the parietal ventral area in macaque monkeys.

Reference.Quotation: "In the second case (99-6RM, Fig.6), a small injection of FR was made into the approximate location of the face representation."

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin
